name: Lys (EvaLecocq)
description:
In a " Jardin Public " of Bordeaux, a young child tries to get out of it by asking for help from the surrounding animals, which in addition to helping him, teach him more about the local flora and fauna.

The player plays a young boy venturing into the " Jardin Public " ( park in Bordeaux ). Its goal is to get out of the park and incidentally to complete its herbarium.

To help him in his adventure, he will meet different animals (endangered or not) who will guide him, or ask for his help.

Collection and exploration game.

Discover the " Jardin Public " in the eyes of a child.

The Park has a very magical aspect, coming from another world. The contemplative aspect is very present, and the decor immersive and imposing.

Teams : Killian Delias / Théo Martin / Clement Cousseau / Eva Lecocq
